data.description:
FIGHT together against different enemies in the Hex7 Battle Arena.
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974468_332017743231769_3438180485989163490_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=LbDKrGFcoNgQ7kNvgHduyr2&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&gid=AJfahgwkp10GS8nRf04vSD0&oh=00_AYCGhGYwUUBgDR1tYcAGtfA57-wjn0iKh9Nv7R09ChxFJA&oe=668BCBB7)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game a much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75507168_1446865232891556_3763410573840822716_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=m8vQQfSnpRIQ7kNvgHZWKTr&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&gid=AJfahgwkp10GS8nRf04vSD0&oh=00_AYAWu5iN9gtJ3r9keQQgK44UaPgJNbdTxeb7HM9qVPgCIQ&oe=668BD952)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003262_985625342809911_4235982824831484550_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=gIf8zrjk1Z4Q7kNvgEPdjzt&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&gid=AJfahgwkp10GS8nRf04vSD0&oh=00_AYDjjYWRsz1jdoERaMRh-VUiULcWhjNoDBBFniZC6hL4MQ&oe=668BC489)
